subtitle: A richer style of soup with a hint of sherry.

method.text: Put mushrooms, stock, grated rind and juice of lime, mint and sherry into saucepan. Bring to boil and simmer for 3 min.
Process in a blender or food processor until fairly smooth. Return to pan, stir in cream and reheat gently - but do not allow to boil.

title: Special mushroom soup
